short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with Chronikles in the easiest way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Logged in users can click  this icon to automatically submit to the Chronikles reference application. The extension will extract the headline, published date and URL for you so all you need to do is click save. Happy Chronikling.
